item.title: Real Companies, Gas Stations & Billboards v4.01.05 1.55 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 14, 2025

Real Companies, Gas Stations & Billboards v4.01.05 1.55 ATS

Back to version 4.01.05 due to 1.55 bugs

This mod has:
– Deliverable real companies
– Real gas station brands
– Realistic HD-trailerskins
– Real fastfood restaurants
– Realistic up to date billboards
– Real shops
– Real hotel & motels names
– Airplane liveries
– Company vans
– Roadservice signs
– Various small signs, containers and vehicles

Works with:
– ATS version 1.55
– DX11 & OpenGL
– All DLC’s fully supported, not all are needed to run the mod.
– Convoy
– Most common used map mods
– Most common traffic-skin mods

Credits: MLH82

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: WBPD (West Balkans Path-Breaker’s Direction) Map v4.5 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 14, 2025

WBPD (West Balkans Path-Breaker’s Direction) Map v4.5 ETS2

Reworked A1 (E73) motorway (Donji Svilaj, Bosnia) including its border crossings
Added new scenery towns: Županja (Croatia) & Vukosavlje, Modriča, Šamac, and Orašje (Bosnia and Herzegovina)
Added new roads in Bosnia: M14.1 from Bosanski Brod to Modriča, M17 from Modriča to Šamac, R462a from Šamac to Lončari junction, M1.8 from Lončari to Orašje border crossing
Added new road in Croatia: D55 from Vukovar to Županja border crossing (including the highway exit between A5 and D55).
Several bug fixes from the previous map version.

Description:
It’s a new little add-on map mod that contains an extensive rework of the West Balkans DLC map for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). It’s designed for players seeking to explore new realistic routes through the map.

Requirements:
ETS2 1.55
Only a map DLC: West Balkans

Credits: Septian_MR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfather’s Kenworth K Series Trucks Skins Pack v1.2 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 14, 2025

The Godfather’s Kenworth K Series Trucks Skins Pack v1.2 ATS

The Godfather’s Kenworth K Series Trucks Skins Pack

This is a Kenworth Truck Skins Pack for the K Series Trucks of the Kenworth K100 From the Stream Workshop plus K200 RTA Paid Mod Truck , K108 RTA Mods Paid Mod Truck & K104 Modded Truck and has some Real Life Trucking Companies and Brands and much more high Detailing and build using Mod Studio 2 all skins in the pack are copyright owned by The Godfather’s Mods Company EST 2021 & Australia Worldwide Entertainment You Tube channel and is only for entertainment use.

v1.0 (Launch Release)
The Launch edition of the pack has K100/K104/108 & K200 Skins in the pack

v1.1 (Update May 2025)
This update bring the pack in line with the update to 1.54 of ATS plus adds 5 New K108 Skins & 7 New K200RTA/Paboy Skins plus we have fixed all 41 K100 Overfloater Skins to now work with the updated Steam Workshop edition pack has been updated for 1.54 of ATS.

V1.2 (Update July 2025)
This Update Brings 22 New Skins to the pack with 15 new skins for the Kenworth K200 RTA/Paboy Truck , 4 New Kenworth K104B Skins & 3 New Kenworth K108 RTA Skins list of the new skins are listed below with the other skins in the pack plus this update brings the pack up to ATS v1.55

List of Skins are listed below Ones that are shown (NEW) are been added to the latest Update to the Mod.
